Geology Functions

Geology Functions

generateDikes

  • generateDikes(__namedParameters: { projected?: boolean; stress: Serie }): Serie

  • Generate dikes from stress data. This is essentially the same as generateJoints. A dike is represented by its normal

    example
    const dikes = geop.generateDikes({
     stress: computedStressSerie,
     projected: false
})
    see

    generateJoints

    see

    JointData

    Parameters

    • __namedParameters: { projected?: boolean; stress: Serie }
      • Optional projected?: boolean
      • stress: Serie

    Returns Serie
